## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] feat
- [ ] fix
- [ ] docs
- [ ] test
- [ ] chore/ci/refactor

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows conventional commits (for Release Please), e.g. `feat: ...` or `fix: ...`
- [ ] I ran `pre-commit run -a`
- [ ] I ran `uv run pytest tests/ -v`
- [ ] I updated documentation when behavior changed
- [ ] If pricing data changed, `source.url` and `source.last_verified` are present and correct
- [ ] If pricing logic changed, tests cover the updated behavior
